title: Songs and Psalmes composed into 3.4. and 5. parts for the vse and delight of all such as either loue or learne musicke: By John Mundy gentleman, bachiler of musicke, and one of the organest of hir Maiesties free chappell of VVindsor.
author: Mundy, John, d. 1630.
publisher: By Thomas Est, (the assigne of William Byrd,) dwelling in Aldersgate street, at the signe of the black Horse,
